formulas.description: a = first term, d = common difference

formulas.name: Sum of AP
formulas.description: Two equivalent forms for sum of arithmetic progression

formulas.name: Insert k AMs between a and b
formulas.description: Common difference when inserting k arithmetic means

formulas.name: GP nth Term
formulas.description: a = first term, r = common ratio

formulas.name: Sum of GP (Finite)
formulas.formula: Sₙ = a(r^n − 1)/(r − 1) for r > 1; a(1 − r^n)/(1 − r) for r < 1
formulas.description: Sum of first n terms of geometric progression

formulas.name: Arithmetic Mean
formulas.formula: AM of a and b = (a + b)/2

formulas.name: Geometric Mean
formulas.description: Single GM between two positive numbers

formulas.name: Harmonic Mean
formulas.formula: HM of a and b = 2ab/(a + b)

formulas.name: AM-GM-HM Inequality
formulas.formula: AM ≥ GM ≥ HM (equality when all terms equal)
formulas.description: Fundamental inequality for positive real numbers. Very useful for min/max problems.
formulas.use_case: Finding minimum of x + 1/x type expressions

formulas.name: Sum of First n Natural Numbers
Sum of Cubes
formulas.description: Sum of cubes equals square of sum of natural numbers

formulas.name: Arithmetico-Geometric Series
formulas.formula: Sum = a·b/(1−r) + d·b·r/(1−r)² for infinite AGP
formulas.description: Series where nth term = (AP term)(GP term). Use S − rS method.

formulas.name: Telescoping Series
formulas.description: Most terms cancel. Use partial fractions: 1/(k(k+1)) = 1/k − 1/(k+1)
